DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose non-interventional , multinational study assess feasibility assess PD-L1 protein expression cytological sample surrogate histological sample obtain participant stage non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) small cell lung cancer ( SCLC ) .
